title: Configuration schema
description: The Revanced Discord bot configuration schema.

media_channels.description: A list of channel ids where only media is allowed.

logging_channel.description: The id of the channel to send logs to.

roles.description: A list of role ids. Users with these roles have administrative privileges over this Discord bot.

users.description: A list of user ids. Users with these ids have administrative privileges over this Discord bot.

administrators.description: The list of administrators to control the Discord bot.

channels.description: A list of channel ids. The bot will only introduce in threads under these channels.

response.description: The response to send when the thread has been created.

thread_introductions.description: Introduce new threads with a message.

channel_id.description: The location of the role embed.

obtainable.description: Whether or not there will be a button for this role.

channels.description: A list of channel ids. The bot will only respond to messages in these channels.

match.description: The message must match this regex to be responded to.

roles.description: A list of role ids. The bot will not respond to messages from users with these roles.

match.description: Messages matching this regex will not be responded to.

server_age.description: The user must be less than this many days old on the server.

condition.description: The conditions to respond to the message.

response.description: The response to send when the message is responded to.

items.description: The conditions to respond to a message.

message_responses.description: A list of responses the Discord bot should send based on given conditions.

items.description: The field to add to the embed.

fields.description: The fields to add to the embed.

image.description: The image to add to the embed.

thumbnail.description: The thumbnail to add to the embed.

icon_url.description: The url of the author's icon.

author.description: The author to add to the embed.

icon_url.description: The url of the footer's icon.

footer.description: The footer to add to the embed.

message.description: The message. Can be empty if the embed is not empty
